hero.title: DeepFake Detection
hero.subtitle: Not everything you see is what it seems

overview.title: Project Overview
overview.intro: Our DeepFake Detector project leverages advanced AI algorithms to identify and analyze manipulated videos with exceptional precision.
overview.goal_text: To automatically detect DeepFake videos by dividing the face into regions and tracking temporal changes within each part.The system analyzes frame-by-frame variations to identify unnatural inconsistencies or distortions that indicate video manipulation.
overview.tech_text: Built using YuNet for face detection and Temporal Transformer Networks for sequential frame analysis. The system divides the face into temporal regions, extracts intensity and residual features between consecutive frames, and applies patch embedding with efficient self-attention to achieve accurate DeepFake classification.
overview.impact_text: Empowering users and media platforms to verify the credibility of online videos and images.By promoting transparency and trust in digital media, our project contributes to reducing misinformation and building a safer online environment
